Text:
HI, i need a help from you rjaa, i am new to this, i was trying to install street fighter by downloading from your upload, http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6508164/Super_Street_Fighter_IV_Arcade_Edition_PC
Cannot seem to do it, please help!!!!

@chayan Installation:

1. Unpack the release
2. Mount or burn image
3. Install
4. Copy all files from the SKIDROW folder to the game installation
5. Play the game

Thank you for replying. I am new in this, please help me out with the installation. I have downloaded the entire 7.12 GB, there are 77 zip file and 1 Leeme file. I hope you know how difficult it can become for a first timer! I have downloaded the Daemon Tool, donot know how to use it though. And also i do not know what is SKIDROW folder. So request you to please help me, and if you treat me like a computer illiterate, i think then it will help me a lot... Thank you once again

bro 
1st you must download POWER ISO = http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7418729/Power_Iso_5.2__Serials_-_[EC]

after installation extract all zip files from Super Street Fighter IV Arcade Edition PC

after extracting you will get a ISO file of that game DVD

Mount that discimage file with poweriso by clicking TOOLS->Virtual drive->Mount image to drive.

after this step you can see all files in your DVD Drive.

then simply install game by clicking setup.exe

after installation copy all files from SKIDROW folder to your game installed folder.

Thanks a lot RJAA!!! with your help I am able to install the game, the last thing, when I am trying to copy all the files from SKIDROW folder to game installed folder, it says file already exist there. So , do I replace those files, or do I copy them in a different folder? I think after this I will be able to play the game!!! Thanks a lot!
